name: Acid Drop
description: Acid Drop is a vibrant lime green paint colour and as its name suggests, is a bright and energetic citrus shade. Available in-store and online.

name: All White
description: All White unusually contains no other pigment except for white, creating the softest most sympathetic colour. Available in-store and online.

name: Ammonite
description: Ammonite is neither too warm nor too cool, its subtle grey tone creates a hushed and calming feel in homes both old and new. Available in-store and online.

name: Ancona Blue
description: Ancona is the Farrow & Ball interpretation of duck-egg blue, inspired by the delicately coloured eggs of the Ancona duck. Available in-store and online.

name: Archive
description: Archive is perceived by many as a classic taupe paint colour, and creates a rich glow in any room of the house. Available in-store and online.

name: Arsenic
description: Arsenic has a lively, stimulating feel and it's vivid mint colour makes it feel at home on contemporary kitchen cabinets. Available in-store and online.

name: Ash Grey
description: Ash Grey has a relaxed feel that makes it suited to any space, particularly when combined with a warmer white on woodwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Au Lait
description: Au Lait is a soft white inspired by the chicory coffee popular in New Orleans, often served with milk. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Babouche
description: Babouche takes its exotic name from the distinctive colour of the leather slippers worn by people in Morocco. Available in-store and online.

name: Ball Green
description: Ball Green is a tribute to Richard Ball, the paint pioneer who first founded our company in Dorset, England with John Farrow. Available in-store and online

name: Ballroom Blue
description: Ballroom Blue takes its name from the entertaining spaces and ballrooms of which it was once a common feature. Available in-store and online.

name: Bamboozle
description: Bamboozle is a spirited, flame red which brings joy to any room, and is easy to use in both traditional and modern homes. Available in-store and online.

name: Bancha
description: Bancha is perfect for those who want to embrace a strong colour in the home, it creates rooms that feel calm and serene. Available in-store and online.

name: Barrow Blue
description: Barrow Blue is a faded blue grey and is reminiscent of faded gardeners' overalls and feels delightfully grounded. Available in-store and online.

name: Bay Area Blue
description: Bay Area Blue is a clear bright blue inspired by the sparkling blue waters of the popular San Francisco Bay Area. Available in-store and online.

name: Beetle Black
description: Beetle Black is a chic and understated grey inspired by the distinctive sheen of the wing casings of beetles. Available in-store and online.

name: Belvedere Blue
description: Belvedere Blue is a classic indigo which appears stronger when used in small rooms, creating dramatic spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Berrington Blue
description: Berrington Blue is a blackened mid-tone blue which is a stronger alternative to the ever-popular Oval Room Blue. Available in-store and online.

name: Beverly
description: Beverly is a dependable colour, with the ability to feel even greener in bright daylight or conservative in lower light. Available in-store and online.

name: Bible Black
description: Bible Black is a purple based black that is an inky violet shade that adds richness and depth to any feature, inside or out. Available in-store and online.

name: Biscuit
description: Biscuit is a dark cream, with its distinct green base, sits perfectly with the lighter String and Matchstick. Available in-store and online.

name: Bisque
description: Bisque is as warming as the classic French dish from which it takes it's name and is a welcoming addition to any space. Available in-store and online.

name: Black Blue
description: Black Blue takes its name from the two essential pigments that make up its rich colour, and appears more blue in some lights. Available in-store and online

name: Blackened
description: Blackened is our coolest white, with a hint of grey, historically made with the addition of lamp black pigment. Available in-store and online.

name: Blanc De Chine
description: Blanc de Chine takes its name from the exquisite porcelain originally made by the master potters of China's Fujian province. Available in-store and online.

name: Blanc De Treillage
description: Blanc de Treillage is an understated warm white paint colour that works well in any kind of supporting role within the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Blazer
description: Blazer is a bright and cheerful and grabs your attention just like the sports blazers worn at St John’s College. Available in-store and online.

name: Blooth Pink
description: Blooth Pink is a pretty, yellowed pink that takes it's name from the Dorset dialect word for 'blossom'. Available in-store and online.

name: Blue Gray
description: Blue Gray is a cool blue grey which creates the most relaxed of rooms that feel as if they have always been there. Available in-store and online.

name: Blue Ground
description: Blue Ground is a clean mid blue which creates an upbeat and happy atmosphere which is often used as an accent colour. Available in-store and online.

name: Blue Maize
description: Blue Maize is a deep blue inspired by the unique hue of corn popular in Mexico and the Southern States. Available in-store and online.

name: Bombazine
description: Bombazine is somewhere between cream and yellow and takes its name from a twilled dress fabric of worsted and silk. Available in-store and online.

name: Bone
description: Bone is a soft grey with a touch of green, and is simply named after the colour of bones found in the animal kingdom Available in-store and online.

name: Book Room Red
description: Book Room Red is an aged terracotta and the muddiest of our reds. It is particularly suited to smaller spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Borrowed Light
description: Borrowed Light is a wonderfully pale blue named after the delicate light that cascades through small windows and fanlights. Available in-store and online.

name: Bothy Blue
description: Bothy Blue is a vibrant ultramarine and has an inherently happy feel and is a brilliant wall colour for family rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Brassica
description: Brassica’s rich lavender tones feel charming in light areas, but become sophisticated and grey in darker areas. Available in-store and online.

name: Breakfast Room Green
description: Breakfast Room Green is the most cheerful of all our greens, remaining lively in both bright sunlight or candlelight. Available in-store and online.

name: Brinjal
description: Brinjal takes its name from the beautifully deep and shiny skin of the aubergine, to create a sophisticated finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Broccoli Brown
description: A dark, quiet colour that pairs perfectly with natural materials like wood or flagstone. Reserved and comforting. Available in-store and online.

name: Buff
description: Buff is a timeless sandy neutral with an underlying warmth that suits all kinds of traditional paint colour schemes. Available in-store and online.

name: Butterweed
description: Butterweed is a clear and lively yellow that mimics the cheerfful petal colour of the plant from whihch it takes it's name. Available in-store and online.

name: Cabbage White
description: Cabbage White is perfect for rooms that go up into the eaves where you want to use just one colour on both walls and ceiling. Available in-store and online

name: Calamine
description: Calamine has a light touch of grey preventing this subtle pink from being too sugary, giving a much fresher finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Calke Green
description: Calke Green is a rich and traditional sage green colour originally found in the breakfast room at Calke Abbey. Available in-store and online.

name: Calluna
description: Calluna is a tranquil lilac which takes its name from the beautiful heather so prolific across the moors of Scotland. Available in-store and online.

name: Cane
description: Cane is an earth based yellow paint colour that has a wonderfully surprising brightness to it when artificially lit. Available in-store and online.

name: Card Room Green
description: Card Room Green is a dark grey green colour named after the study like rooms much favoured in the Victorian period. Available in-store and online.

name: Cardamom
description: Cardamon is a rich brown inspired by the versatile spice used in dishes around the world. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Carriage Green
description: This intense dark green hue makes a very sophisticated shade for front doors, especially in high-shine Full Gloss. Available in-store and online.

name: Castle Gray
description: Castle Gray’s first use was on the exterior woodwork of a castle, but it’s a wonderfully versatile shade for all homes. Available in-store & online.

name: Cats Paw
description: Cat's Paw is an earthy yellow-toned neutral that is not named after the animal but after a complicated nautical knot. Available in-store and online.

name: Chappell Green
description: Chappell Green is a subdued blue-green that reads blue when contrasted with warmer tones and green when paired with cooler. Available in-store and online.

name: Charleston Gray
description: Charleston Gray is popular for use in modern living rooms, and its brown undertones create a warm, enveloping atmosphere. Available in-store and online.

name: Charlotte's Locks
description: Charlotte's Locks takes its inspiration from the flame red hair of our Creative Director and brings a playful late 1970s look. Available in-store & online.

name: Chemise
description: Chemise is a stony modern grey that looks equally at home in an airy, industrial space as it does in a historic home. Available in-store and online.

name: Chine Green
description: Chine Green takes its name from coastal gorges that are a common around our home on the south coast of England. Available in-store and online.

name: Chinese Blue
description: Inspired by the blue and white patterned Chinese ceramics displayed in the room for which it was originally mixed. Available in-store and online.

name: Churlish Green
description: Churlish Green is a yellow based green takes its name from the old English definition relating to simple peasant life. Available in-store and online.

name: Ciara Yellow
description: With a slightly more aged look than Yellow Ground, Ciara Yellow feels gently lived-in, perfect for traditional living spaces. Available in-store and online

name: Cinder Rose
description: Cinder Rose is the perfect colour for creating a dusky feel in a bedroom, but is also much favoured in garden rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Citron
description: Citron is a warm Mediterranean yellow which has a bright intensity in small spaces and is fantastically welcoming in halls. Available in-store and online.

name: Citrona
description: Citrona paint colour is inspired by the beautiful lemon trees that thrive in California’s warm temperate climate. Available in-store and online.

name: Clunch
description: Clunch is aptly named after the chalk stone used in the off white building blocks of many East Anglian buildings. Available in-store and online.

name: Cola
description: Cola is a red-based brown that has underlying warmth making it perfect for those looking to embrace a small space. Available in-store and online.

name: Cooking Apple Green
description: Cook’s Blue is a bright and deeply pigmented colour that is perfect for use both in kitchens and exterior eating areas. Available in-store and online.

name: Cook's Blue
description: Cooking Apple Green is a Farrow & Ball classic which feels charmingly familiar and creates the feeling of health and vigour. Available in-store and online.

name: Copenhagen Roof
description: Copenhagen Roof is inspired by the old city of Copenhagen, where red roof tiles sit atop brightly coloured townhouses. Available in-store and online.

name: Coppice Blue
description: Coppice Blue is a rich deep teal paint colour which creates a dramatic feel in contemporary hallways and living rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Cord
description: Cord is a warm hue that has a surprising strength of colour in underlit rooms, so is often used in studies and libraries. Available in-store and online.

name: Cornforth White
description: Cornforth White is an undertated grey which is neither too warm nor too cool, and creates a hushed and calming retreat. Available in-store and online.

name: Corngold
description: Corngold is a distinctive lively yellow which takes its name from the colour of sun-ripened maize, and brings joy to any room. Available in-store & online.

name: Cream
description: Cream is a classic neutral colour that is given extra complexity with the addition of yellow ochre and black pigments. Available in-store and online.

name: Crimson Red
description: Crimon Red is a deep warm pink that creates spaces that feel soft and inviting. Available in-store and online.

name: Cromarty
description: Cromarty brings a muted softness to any room, creating an easy to use finish that is neither too blue nor too grey. Available in-store and online.

name: Danish Lawn
description: Danish Lawn is a vivid fresh green that conjures the freshness of newly cut lawns and the clear light of a Danish spring day. Available in-store and online

name: Dauphin
description: A versatile, earthy neutral, Dauphin takes its inspiration from the ‘drabs’ beloved by decorators of the 19th century. Available in-store and online.

name: Dayroom Yellow
description: Dayroom Yellow is a refreshing pale yellow which takes its name from rooms which were light and enjoyed during the day. Available in-store and online.

name: De Nimes
description: De Nimes feels wonderfully down to earth, so could be used on anything from a kitchen island to an airy drawing room. Available in-store and online.

name: Dead Salmon
description: Dead Salmon is a subtle shade whose name refers to the flat or ‘dead’ finish of an aged pink painted at Kedleston Hall in 1805. Available in-store & online

name: Deep Reddish Brown
description: Deep Reddish Brown was once popular in country houses, where it was often used to highlight the woodwork of back stairs. Available in-store and online.

name: Dibber
description: A muddied green named after the gardener's tool for planting, closely associated to the natural world. Available in-store and online.

name: Dimity
description: Dimity is a very pale taupe colour named after the lightweight cotton fabric originally used to make bustles. Available in-store and online.

name: Dimpse
description: Dimpse is a delicate grey named after the quaint dialect for twilight. It's part of our Architectural Neutrals. Available in-store and online.

name: Dinnerware
description: Dinnerware is a clean blue and evocative of the colour used in 18th-century chinaware. Available in-store and online.

name: Dix Blue
description: Dix Blue is a relaxed blue that has a large dose of green included in it, making it both warm and easy to live with. Available in-store and online.

name: Dorset Cream
description: Dorset Cream’s name conjures up exactly the right colour in our minds; a rich double cream made in the West Country. Available in-store and online.

name: Double Cream
description: Double Cream is a warm cream that particularly shines in north-facing rooms, where it counteracts the perceived green light. Available in-store and online.

name: Douter
description: Inspired by the soot and tarnished brass of candle snuffers, this is a green interpretation of our beloved Inchyra Blue. Available in-store and online.

name: Dove Tale
description: Dove Tale has lilac undertones and is perfect for those who are wanting a warm grey finish as it creates an inviting feel. Available in-store and online.

name: Down Pipe
description: Down Pipe is a dark lead grey which has definite blue undertones to it which deepen the complexity of the finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Drab
description: Drab simply means a colour lacking in brightness, and this typical 18th-century colour encapsulates it perfectly. Available in-store and online.

name: Drawing Room Blue
description: Drawing Room Blue has a clean blue hue and graphic feel that works particularly well in formal rooms within the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Drop Cloth
description: Drop Cloth is the traditional name for the indispensable painter's dust sheet which this muted colour embodies. Available in-store and online.

name: Duck Green
description: Duck Green is a wonderful reminder of the exquisite colours of nature and is named after the deep green plumage of a mallard. Available in-store and online

name: Duster
description: An aged yellow celebrating the ever so familiar cloth used to clean homes worldwide. Available in-store and online.

name: Dutch Orange
description: Dutch Orange is a clean bright orange with the ability to enliven any space, and has an enveloping warmth to rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Dutch Pink
description: This peachy colour takes its name from the original ‘Dutch pink’, an artist’s yellow pigment made from bark or berries. Available in-store and online.

name: Dyrehaven
description: Dyrehaven is a deep, earthy green that takes its name from the historic deer park that offers fresh air, lakes, and woodlands. Available in-store & online.

name: Eating Room Red
description: Eating Room Red is a rich burgandy that gives a rich finish with a wonderfully aged feel, and is our most elegant red. Available in-store and online.

name: Eddy
description: Eddy creates a seamless connection with nature, perfect for use in a garden room or alongside natural materials. Available in-store and online.

name: Elephant's Breath
description: Elephant's Breath reads as an uplifting mid grey, but can become almost lilac in the cooler light of west facing rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Emerald Green
description: Emerald Green is a bright, uncomplicated green that is easy to use, creating rooms with an upbeat yet elegant atmosphere. Available in-store and online.

name: Entrance Hall Pink
description: Entrance Hall Pink has a distinctly yellow base which delights in different light conditions due to its changeable nature. Available in-store and online.

name: Etruscan Red
description: An earthy red inspired by an ancient civilisation. Rich yet subtle, less intense than Preference Red. Available in-store and online.

name: Faded Terracotta
description: Faded Terracotta is the singular colour of terracotta pots and tiles baked to a pale hue by the California sun. Available in-store and online.

name: Fake Tan
description: Fake Tan is a subtly warm peach and brings an earthy warmth to all rooms, but particularly shines in south facing spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Farrow's Cream
description: Farrow’s Cream is a pretty, traditional colour, which creates delightfully inviting rooms with a gentle warmth. Available in-store and online.

name: Farrow's White
description: Farrow's White can be used with any Farrow & Ball paint colour, making it one of our most versatile shades in the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Fawn
description: Fawn is our interpretation of a classic 18th-century tan, and can be easily used across both walls and woodwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Folly Green
description: Folly Green is a strong but soothing green that's easy to use in all sorts of homes, creating spaces that feel relaxed. Available in-store and online.

name: Folly Pink
description: Folly Pink is a very pale terracotta, appearing more neutral when used on exteriors and warmer when used indoors. Available in-store and online.

name: Fowler Pink
description: Fowler Pink was particularly favoured by decorator and colourist John Fowler, who used it often in paints and wallpapers. Available in-store and online.

name: Fox Red
description: Fox Red is a clear, earhty terracotta paint colour, stronger than that of Red Earth, gives it an appealingly aged feel. Available in-store and online.

name: French Gray
description: French Gray is much more green than grey, but characterfully flits between the two depending on the light and time of day. Available in-store and online.

name: Fruit Fool
description: Fruit Fool is names after the summer pudding and is a mouthwatering pink that never feels too sweet with it's blue tones. Available in-store and online.

name: Gervase Yellow
description: Gervase Yellow is a sunny yellow paint colour that is named in memory of Gervase Jackson-Stops, the late Architectural Adviser. Available in-store & online

name: Grate Black
description: Grate Black sits between the softer tones in our collection, creating a versatile shade for trim and metalwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Graupel
description: Graupel is a very light paint colour, the coolest of our blues, and is as delicate as the ice it is named after. Available in-store and online.

name: Great White
description: Great White appears to be a very pale lilac when contrasted with our All White, making it perfect for children’s bedrooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Green Blue
description: Green Blue is exactly what it says – sometimes blue and sometimes green depending on the changing light throughout the day. Available in-store and online.

name: Green Ground
description: Green Ground has a calming feel, so is well suited to use in kitchens to create a contented family atmosphere. Available in-store and online.

name: Green Smoke
description: Green Smoke has an inviting deepness when used in exterior situations, while evoking calm and serenity when used inside. Available in-store and online.

name: Green Stone
description: Green Stone is a green based netral and appears distincly green to the modern eye despite its long-standing popularity. Available in-store and online.

name: Grove Green
description: Grove Green is a deep natural green that creates luxurious-feeling spaces with an indelible connection to the natural world. Available in-store and online.

name: Hague Blue
description: Hague Blue is a deep, dark blue that has green undertones which means it sits as happily outside as it does in small rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Hardwick White
description: Hardwick White’s rich and chalky hue sits just as well in a contemporary room as it does in a historic house. Available in-store and online.

name: Harissa
description: Harissa is a fiery red that creates a warming effect in the home and transforms any small room into a bold, energetic space. Available in-store and online.

name: Hay
description: Hay is a dusty yellow that has a distinctly green undertone which gives it an established feel, creating peaceful spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Hazy
description: Hazy is a muted blue-grey paint colour inspired by the fresh feeling of early mornings on the California coast. Available in-store and online.

name: Hog Plum
description: Hog Plum is a yellow inspired by the sweet & sour fruit found across the Southern States. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Hopper Head
description: Hopper Head is a classic charcoal colour inspired by the iron containers used to catch rainwater at the top of a downpipe. Available in-store and online.

name: Hound Lemon
description: Hound Lemon is originally chosen by colourist John Fowler, Hound Lemon is a mysterious name for this delicate shade. Available in-store and online.

name: House White
description: House White is a clean citrus white paint colour with a green undertone which brings with it a bright and fresh finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Imperial Purple
description: Deep Imperial Purple transforms dining rooms and other intimate spaces, creating a luxurious look and enveloping feel. Available in-store and online.

name: Incarnadine
description: Incarnadine is our richest crimson originally takes its name from Latin, but is now a much used term for crimsons and reds. Available in-store and online.

name: Inchyra Blue
description: Inchyra Blue is inspired by the dramatic Scottish skies that act as a backdrop for the classic Georgian Inchyra House. Available in-store and online.

name: India Yellow
description: India Yellow is famously named after the pigment collected from the urine of cows fed on a special diet of mango leaves! Available in-store and online.

name: James White
description: James White was first created for the pretty garden room of a discerning Dr James with a fresh underlying green tone. Available in-store and online.

name: Jitney
description: Jitney is a relaxed brown based neutral with an incredibly uplifting earthy tone which reminds us of lazy days spent by the sea. Browse online.

name: Joa's White
description: Joa's White is a light taupe named after our Colour Consultant Joa, who still develops many Farrow & Ball colours. Available in-store and online.

name: Kakelugn
description: The cleaner interpretation of Light Blue takes its name from the folkloric fires of Sweden, often decorated in this shade. Available in-store and online.

name: Kittiwake
description: Kittiwake has a touch more black pigment creating a warmer, more relaxed feel. This shade is perfect for living spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Lake Red
description: Lake Red ia an adventurous colour that appears red to some and pink to others, but always feels happy and vital. Available in-store and online.

name: Lamp Room Gray
description: Lamp Room Gray is a traditional mid grey that creates a softer, more lived in finish, while retaining a sense of timelessness. Available in-store & online.

name: Lancaster Yellow
description: Lancaster Yellow is a fresh pale yellow which is inspired by the silk on the walls of the Yellow Room at Kelmarsh Hall. Available in-store and online.

name: Lichen
description: Lichen is a mid aged green which is named after the subtle colour of the algae that ages stone so beautifully. Available in-store and online.

name: Light Blue
description: Light Blue becomes more silver in tone when used in shaded areas so is popular for use on walls in internal halls. Available in-store and online.

name: Light Gray
description: Light Gray brings a depth of colour when used on walls and is the perfect accent for all our Traditional Neutrals. Available in-store and online.

name: Light Sand
description: Light Sand is a versatile neutral that conjures images of Malibu, with its soft-sanded beaches and its coastal homes. Available in-store and online.

name: Light Stone
description: Light Stone adds intrigue to any scheme, especially when paired with a lighter neutral on woodwork for a classic combination. Available in-store and online

name: Lime White
description: Lime White is the palest of our Traditional Neutrals and is named after the chalky pigments used in original distempers. Available in-store and online.

name: Liquorice
description: Liquorice is the warm, deep black of that classic sweet created using the root of the plant. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Lobster
description: Lobster is a vibrant, lively blue that takes its name from the popular Louisiana catch. Available in-store and online.

name: Loggia
description: Loggia is an elegant original shade that was chosen for its resemblance to the classic red brickwork surrounding it. Available in-store and online.

name: London Clay
description: London Clay is loaded with magenta pigment for a rich, earthy hue that creates the most charismatic and elegant of rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: London Stone
description: London Stone was created for a classic Nash house in Regent’s Park. It is the perfect accent for each of our Warm Neutrals. Available in-store and online

name: Lulworth Blue
description: Lulworth Blue can promote deep and peaceful sleep when used in low-lit rooms, especially when used on both walls and woodwork. Available in-store & online.

name: Mahogany
description: Mahogany is an invitingly rich brown which takes its name from the dark red wood used by master cabinet makers. Available in-store and online.

name: Manor House Gray
description: Manor House Gray is a definite grey which retains its colour in all lights and is popular in hard-edged contemporary homes. Available in-store and online.

name: Marmelo
description: Named after the portugese word for quince and inspiration for marmalade, this is a thoroughly comforting shade. Available in-store and online.

name: Matchstick
description: Matchstick has a tiny addition of black, but is a versatile tone named after the unbleached wood used in the stalk of a match. Available in-store & online.

name: Menagerie
description: This mid-tone terracotta takes it name from the unique home of architectural historian Gervase Jackson-Stops. Available in-store and online.

name: Mere Green
description: Mere Green is a luxurious teal paint colour, that bursts with energy, making it ideal for the contemporary home. Available in-store and online.

name: Middle Ground
description: Middle Ground is on the blue side of aqua and was originally made as a background colour for Farrow & Ball wallpapers. Available in-store and online.

name: Middleton Pink
description: Middleton Pink is our prettiest and most delicate pink and was named after the discerning colourist, Catherine Middleton. Available in-store and online.

name: Minster Green
description: Minster Green is an inviting deep green inspired by our home in Dorset, just outside the market town of Wimborne Minster. Available in-store and online.

name: Mizzle
description: Mizzle is a soft grey green that is named after West Country evening skies when there is a mix of both mist and drizzle. Available in-store and online.

name: Mole's Breath
description: Mole's Breath is effective on kitchen islands and feels daring yet comforting when used on the walls of smaller spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Monkey Puzzle
description: Monkey Puzzle is a typical 'estate green colour' that remains irresistible for the walls of contemporary homes. Available in-store and online.

name: Mortar Pink
description: Mortar Pink would have been seen as pink in the 18th centuary, while to the modern eye it appears more yellow. Available in-store and online.

name: Mouse's Back
description: Mouse's Back is a grey brown classic takes its characterful name from the fawny colour of the British field mouse. Available in-store and online.

name: Nancy's Blushes
description: Nancy's Blushes is our truest pink named after the scrumptious rosy cheeks of a much loved girl called Nancy. Available in-store and online.

name: Naperon
description: Inspired by the origins of the word apron, this is a familiar clay colour with a well-loved feel. Available in-store and online.

name: New White
description: New White will warm up any room with its soft illumination, working particularly well in a country kitchen setting. Available in-store and online.

name: Octagon Yellow
description: Bright yet soft, Octagon Yellow is a true golden yellow shade that brings the feeling of morning sunlight to any space. Available in-store and online.

name: Off-Black
description: Off-Black is a soft black and one of the original Farrow & Ball colours - an uncomplicated name for a well loved classic. Available in-store and online.

name: Off-White
description: Off-White is a chalky mid tone and one of the original Farrow & Ball colours - an uncomplicated name for a timeless classic. Available in-store and online.

name: Ointment Pink
description: Based on scrapes and cross-sections taken in a number of houses and dating to the early years of the 19th century. Available in-store and online.

name: Old White
description: Old White is a soft grey green that simply earns its name by being the most historic of all our white paint colours. Available in-store and online.

name: Olive
description: Olive is a rich earthy green originally used in panelled rooms and best suited to darker spaces where it comes into it's own.Available in-store and online.

name: Orange Coloured White
description: Orange Coloured White is a fresh yet warm cream with a hint of orange and particularly suited to north-facing spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Orangery
description: It brings an enveloping warmth to walls, especially in south facing rooms that are flooded with light throughout the day. Available in-store and online.

name: Oval Room Blue
description: Oval Room Blue sits perfectly with our greys to create depth and balance in either a hall or a darker, cosier family room. Available in-store and online.

name: Oxford Stone
description: Oxford Stone is a classic dark taupe that was inspired by the cottages found in the pretty Cotswold villages of Oxfordshire. Available in-store and online.

name: Paean Black
description: Paean Black creates an intimate feel in contemporary homes, while adding a distinguished look to traditional exteriors. Available in-store and online.

name: Pale Hound
description: Pale Hound is a delicately aged yellow that sits particularly well in sunny spaces where it reads as a light yellow. Available in-store and online.

name: Pale Powder
description: Pale Powder is a gentle aqua that has an unparalleled softness and in north facing rooms can read almost as a delicate grey. Available in-store and online.

name: Palm
description: Palm has a desaturated quality, as if always being seen in the clear, bright light characteristic of California. Available in-store and online.

name: Pantalon
description: Pantalon changes in different light conditions, making it a particularly captivating shade for exterior paintwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Parma Gray
description: Parma Gray has a cool nature and a firm favourite for those who prefer a clean and crisp finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Pavilion Blue
description: Pavilion Blue is a fresh green blue is inspired by the wonderful Regency colours of the Royal Pavilion in Brighton. Available in-store and online.

name: Pavilion Gray
description: Pavilion Gray is a cool mid grey which adds a contemporary touch and sense of spaciousness with it's subtle blue undertones. Available in-store and online.

name: Pea Flower Tea
description: Pea Flower Tea is a vivid blue named after the brightly coloured drink made with petals. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Pea Green
description: Sitting somewhere between Calke Green and Breakfast Room Green, it has a happy feel that translates to uplifting rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Peignoir
description: Peignoir has a romantic feel inspired by the 19th-century garment of the same name, a chiffon robe worn over underclothes. Available in-store and online.

name: Pelt
description: Pelt is a deep and luxurious purple that has a regal feel and can appear almost black in darker spaces of the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Picture Gallery Red
description: Picture Gallery Red is a rich brown, the timeless red is based on the rich colour of the magnificent gallery at Attingham Park. Browse online.

name: Pigeon
description: Pigeon is a cosy and nostalgic blue grey, and named after the colour of the bird often sighted around the London landscape. Available in-store and online.

name: Pink Cup
description: Pink Cup a charming mid-tone pink paint colour that has a luminous quality that creates warm and charming rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Pink Drab
description: Pink Drab lacks the brightness that can make other pinks appear sugary, resulting in a discreet and charming shade. Available in-store and online.

name: Pink Ground
description: Pink Ground is a dusty blush pink paint colour that creates a warm and soothing finish that doesn’t feel sugary. Available in-store and online.

name: Pitch Black
description: Pitch Black is named after the dark sticky residue of coal tar, and is as pure a black as you can get in our range. Available in-store and online.

name: Pitch Blue
description: Pitch Blue has a purple feel to it and is extremely lively in south facing rooms, especially when contrasted with bright shades.

name: Planter
description: Planter is a warm stone paint colour inspired by the cast-iron urns used as a decorative feature of Victorian gardens. Available in-store and online.

name: Plummett
description: Plummett intensifies in colour in smaller spaces and has a strikingly modern feel which is conducive to minimal living. Available in-store and online.

name: Pointing
description: Pointing is a fresh and uncomplicated white is named after the colour of lime pointing used in traditional brickwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Pond Green
description: Pond Green is an aqua shade inspired by the colour chosen by Sir Winston Churchill for the seats around his garden pond. Available in-store and online.

name: Porphyry Pink
description: Porphyry Pink is a muted rose inspired by the palettes of the Regency period and a dark stone loved by the Romans. Available in-store and online.

name: Potted Shrimp
description: Potted Shrimp is a traditional blush which results in rooms that feel delightfully familiar and embrace you in their warmth. Available in-store and online.

name: Powder Blue
description: Powder Blue is a popular mid blue aqua paint colour that gave rise to another Farrow & Ball classic, Pale Powder. Available in-store and online.

name: Preference Red
description: Preference Red is the deepest of our reds and is named in honor of our original trade name, Preference Paints. Available in-store and online.

name: Print Room Yellow
description: Print Room Yellow a soft golden yellow creates a feeling of instant warmth, especially in rooms with little natural light. Available in-store and online.

name: Purbeck Stone
description: Purbeck Stone is a clean and understated mid grey that resembles the colour of stone found on the Isle of Purbeck. Available in-store and online.

name: Radicchio
description: Radicchio is a modern crimson that confidently fills a room with energy without having the brashness of a true, clean red. Available in-store and online.

name: Railings
description: Railings is a softer alternative to black which is particularly suited to the ironwork it takes its name from. Available in-store and online.

name: Rangwali
description: Rangwali is the most adventurous of our pinks and is exotic, happy and vital, and is named after the Holi festival of colours. Available in store & online.

name: Raw Tomatillo
description: Raw Tomatillo is a joyful and verdant green inspired by fried green tomatoes made by a grandmother. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Rectory Red
description: Rectory Red is a rich, sophisticated, clean red named after the charming village houses built over the years for the clergy. Available in-store and online.

name: Red Earth
description: Red Earth is a rich blend of red and yellow pigments which create a warm earthy feel in homes both old and new. Available in-store and online.

name: Reduced Green
description: The green pigment in this dark neutral has been reduced so much it's barely there — some see brown, others a hint of green. Available in-store and online.

name: Ringwold Ground
description: Ringwold Ground is a fresh feeling neutral cream paint colour which creates a delightfully warm and glowing room. Available in-store and online.

name: Roasted Macadamia
description: Roasted Macadamia is a soft neutral that was named after the nut of a similar shade. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Romesco
description: Romesco is a rich, brilliant red evocative of the classic Spanish sauce. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Salon Drab
description: Salon Drab is a deep chocolate brown that works as a dark accompaniment to both our Warm and Contemporary Neutrals. Available in-store and online.

name: Salt
description: Salt is a bright, crisp white paint colour, reminiscent of the strong salty air ushered in by the Pacific Ocean. Available in-store and online.

name: Sand
description: Sand is a rich caramel-hued neutral paint colour that is very adept at creating spaces that invite and envelop. Available in-store and online.

name: Sap Green
description: An enticing olive shade, Sap Green is a true celebration of nature and feels wonderfully intense in small spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Sardine
description: Sardine is a silver blue that takes its name from a favourite afternoon snack of a loved grandfather. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Savage Ground
description: Savage Ground is a yellow based stone paint colour first created as a background colour for our handcrafted wallpapers. Available in-store and online.

name: Saxon Green
description: Saxon Green is a light traditional green that harks back to a time before British Standard Colours were established in 1931. Available in-store and online.

name: Scallop
description: A lighter take on Dead Salmon, inspired by the soft hue and gentle shape of the shellfish. Available in-store and online.

name: School House White
description: School House White is the lightest colour in the group and is a soft off white reminiscent of the colour used in school houses. Browse online.

name: Selvedge
description: Selvedge is a laid back blue named after the highly prized denim woven on a shuttle loom to produce closed edges. Available in-store and online.

name: Serge
description: Serge is a chic shade named after the original fabric used to make jeans, and is well-suited to entertaining spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Setting Plaster
description: Setting Plaster is a dusty plaster pink named after the blushing walls we often admire in newly plastered houses. Available in-store and online.

name: Shaded White
description: Shaded White is a light grey beige that takes its name from the soft tone created when the white is used in deep shade. Available in-store and online.

name: Shadow Gray
description: Shadow Gray is an understated, slightly weathered neutral paint colour– great for use in south-facing rooms of the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Shadow White
description: Shadow White has a hint of grey and takes its name from the soft tone created when whites are used in shaded areas. Available in-store and online.

name: Shallot
description: Shallot is a cheerful pink that takes its name from a sweeter member of the allium family. Exclusively available for the Carte Blanche collection.

name: Sherbert Lemon
description: Sherbert Lemon is a sunny, uncomplicated yellow paint colour that will fill your room with the feeling of sunlight. Available in-store and online.

name: Singed Red
description: Singed Red is a relaxed rusty red colour that has a large dose of brown pigment, creating a lived-in feel wherever it's used. Available in-store and online

name: Single Cream
description: Single Cream is used to bring warmth to north-facing rooms and looks delightful alongside traditional panelling. Available in-store and online.

name: Sizing
description: A fresh neutral with distinctive blue undertones, this colour has a certain crispness like the starch it is named after. Available in-store and online.

name: Skimmed Milk White
description: Skimmed Milk White has a laid-back nature that creates rooms that feel as if they have been that colour forever. Available in-store and online.

name: Skimming Stone
description: Skimming Stone takes its name from a 19th century plaster colour, but often reminds us of afternoons skimming stones. Available in-store and online.

name: Skylight
description: Skylight is a pale and traditional blue that takes its name from the natural light that often pours through ceiling skylights. Available in-store & online.

name: Slipper Satin
description: Slipper Satin often reads as a pale grey chalk which makes for a perfect neutral on walls with darker woodwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Sloe Blue
description: The black-based Sloe Blue is the perfect colour for contemporary living rooms or distinctive exterior woodwork. Available in-store and online.

name: Smelt Black
description: Smelt Black is a soft base metal paint colour that is perfect for use on ironwork. It is most similar to Railings. Available in-store and online.

name: Smoked Trout
description: Smoked Trout is a dark mushroom tone that can read as anything from a deep taupe to a dustier red depending on the light. Available in-store and online.

name: St Giles Blue
description: St Giles Blue is a vivd blue that cannot fail to make you smile and will hold its own even in the darkest of place. Available in-store and online.

name: Stiffkey Blue
description: Stiffkey Blue is named after the Norfolk beach where the mud, along with the cockles, share a particular deep navy hue. Available in-store and online.

name: Stirabout
description: Stirabout is the perfect oatmeal and is inspired by the nurturing porridge favoured over many centuries in Ireland. Available in-store and online.

name: Stoke
description: Stoke is a true, effortless grey paint colour which brings strength, structure, and clarity to any home decoration palette. Available in-store and online.

name: Stone Blue
description: Stone Blue is a warm and timeless blue, named after the indigo pigment which was often imported in lumps in the 18th century. Available in-store and online

name: Stone White
description: With its unmistakable green undertone, Stone White is an unusual neutral with a beautiful underlying complexity. Available in-store and online.

name: Stony Ground
description: Stony Ground is a classic tone that has a slight underlying red which adds warmth and creates a soft beige finish. Available in-store and online.

name: Straw
description: Straw is a captivating mid-yellow which takes inspiration from colourist John Fowler’s ‘straw left out in the rain’. Available in-store and online.

name: String
description: String is an earthy yellow neutral, the underlying green adds an earthy feel which works well in rooms connected to the outside.

name: Strong White
description: Strong White is the palest of our neurtals and a cool white that is both strong by name and strong by nature. Available in-store and online.

name: Studio Green
description: Studio Green is our darkest green and within the home, this deep hue appears almost black unless in very well lit rooms. Available in-store and online.

name: Sudbury Yellow
description: Sudbury Yellow takes its name from the staircase at Sudbury Hall, where colourist John Fowler used this shade. Available in-store and online.

name: Suffield Green
description: Suffield Green is a lively 'good-taste' green paint colour that was more often seen on a pre-war historical colour card. Available in-store and online.

name: Sugar Bag Light
description: Sugar Bag Light is a charming, weathered blue that was inspired by the sun-bleached bags used to import sugar. Available in-store and online.

name: Sugared Almond
description: Sugared Almond is refreshing pale lilac that is unapologetically charming shade named after a traditional treat. Available in-store and online.

name: Sulking Room Pink
description: Sulking Room Pink is evocative of the colours so often used in boudoirs, a room named after the French "bouder" - to sulk. Available in-store and online.

name: Sutcliffe Green
description: Sutcliffe Green is a connoisseurs green which means it's the ultimate background colour for hanging pictures. Available in-store and online.

name: Tack Room Door
description: Tack Room Door is a weathered mid-brown, evoking years of exposure to the elements. Available in-store and online.

name: Tailor Tack
description: Tailor Tack is the lightest and most delicate of our pinks, and is inspired by tacking thread used in Haute Couture ateliers. Available in-store and online

name: Tallow
description: Tallow's pale finish reflects the light so it is perfect to lift a darker space or paint one colour throughout a property. Available in-store and online.

name: Tanner's Brown
description: Tanner's Brown will read as almost black in lower lighting and creates a softer look when used on the interior of fireplaces. Available in-store and online

name: Tar
description: Tar is the off-black paint colour shade of sun-baked desert highways, which is soft enough to envelop a whole room. Available in-store and online.

name: Templa White
description: Templa White is a pale, honey-coloured cream paint colour that was often used on the walls of garden follies and temples. Available in-store and online.

name: Templeton Pink
description: Templeton Pink was developed for Templeton House to offset the plaques made to commemorate the former owner. Available in-store and online.

name: Teresa's Green
description: Teresa's Green is an aqua fresh tone that owes its freshness to a rich blue base and its warmth to soft green undertones. Available in-store and online.

name: Terre d' Egypte
description: Terre D'Egypte is a deep warm orange-red paint colour that takes its name from the rich land of exotic Egypt. Available in-store and online.

name: Titmouse Blue
description: Titmouse Blue brings a smart look and luxurious atmosphere to any room, especially those designed for entertaining. Available in-store and online.

name: Treron
description: Treron is perfect for modern homes where lots of natural materials are used or as an accent colour on the walls. Available in-store and online.

name: Tunsgate Green
description: Tunsgate Green is a fresh delicte green that is an incredibly versatile finish for both inside and outside the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Turret White
description: Turret White is a warm mid-white paint colour that creates a quietly refined look that's easy to live with in the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Ultra Marine Blue
description: Ultra Marine Blue is a stunning blue with a slight romantic feel, and was often used to make small rooms feel bigger. Available in-store and online.

name: Vardo
description: Vardo is so full of life and joy it seemed natural to name it after something renowned for its flamboyant colour. Available in-store and online.

name: Verdigris Green
description: Verdigris Green is an elegant copper green that retains an underlying reassuring feel when used in any room of the home. Available in-store and online.

name: Vert de Terre
description: Vert De Terre is a delicate green which appears fresh and incredibly soft on walls, reminiscent of the pigment green earth. Available in-store and online.

name: Vichyssoise
description: Vichyssoise's delicate green paint colour will intensify, while in large spaces it appears as just a hint of colour. Available in-store and online.

name: Vitty Green
description: Vitty Green is a contemporary grey-green that creates a palette that feels graphic, crisp, and clean. Available in-store and online.

name: Wainscot
description: Wainscot is a rich, earthy and grounding paint colour. The upfront warm tones of Wainscot help to create intimate spaces. Available in-store and online.

name: Wall White
description: Wall White is a beautifully understated neutral off-white paint colour with a hint less green than Old White. Available in-store and online.

name: Wet Sand
description: Wet Sand is a rich caramel-hued neutral is very adept at creating spaces that invite and envelop. Available in-store and online.

name: Wevet
description: Wevet is clean, understated and incredibly easy to live with. This tone can be used for an understated, neutral space. Available in-store and online.

name: Whirlybird
description: Whirlybird is a lively green inspired by the papery winged seeds beloved by many playful young gardeners and nature lovers. Available in-store and online.

name: White Tie
description: White Tie is a pale creamy white named after the old, pre-brightened, starched cotton used for white tie jackets. Available in-store and online.

name: Wimborne White
description: Wimborne White is 'just off white' and is named after the market town of Wimborne in Dorset and home to Farrow & Ball. Available in-store and online.

name: Wine Dark
description: Wine Dark is a rich, dark blue inspired by midnight skies, and named after the term Homer used to describe the sea. Available in-store and online.

name: Worsted
description: Worsted is a rich mid grey that conjures memories of city suits made from flat woven fabric in Norfolk villages. Available in-store and online.

name: Yard Blue
description: Yard Blue is a lively pain colour that was originally used as the 'estate colour' of a settlement in South Wales. Available in-store and online.

name: Yeabridge Green
description: Yeabridge Green is a brigtht avocado green, first discovered in an 18th century Georgian farmhouse in Yeabridge, Somerset. Available in-store and online.

name: Yellow Ground
description: Yellow Ground is one of our most useable yellows, and was first used as a background colour within our wallpaper collection. Available in-store and online.

name: Yellowcake
description: Yellowcake has a very homely and folkloric feel, so this paint colour was named after a slightly unusual home bake. Available in-store and online.

name: Yonder
description: Yonder is an ultimate refreshing blue paint colour which is reminiscent of the far-off skies of our childhood imaginations. Available in-store and online.
